drug.name: Bunazosin
drug.description: Bunazosin has been used in trials studying the treatment of High Blood Pressure.

classification.description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as quinazolinamines. These are heterocyclic aromatic compounds containing a quianazoline moiety substituted by one or more amine groups.

drug-interaction.name: Dapoxetine
drug-interaction.description: Dapoxetine may increase the orthostatic hypotensive activities of Bunazosin.

drug-interaction.name: Lurasidone
drug-interaction.description: Bunazosin may increase the hypotensive activities of Lurasidone.
